code: import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';export default function useHorizontalScroll(){const elRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const el=elRef.current;if(el){const handleScrollWheel=e=>{if(e.deltaY===0)return;e.preventDefault();el.scrollBy({left:e.deltaY<0?-50:50,behaviour:'smooth'});};el.addEventListener('wheel',handleScrollWheel);return()=>el.removeEventListener('wheel',handleScrollWheel);}},[]);return elRef;}
